steps.name: I have an existing account with an online bookshop
I log into the website

elements.name: Choose a product from random category

steps.name: I extend the Категории menu
I choose random book category
I choose a book from the list
The book description will be loaded with price and an option to order
I have an existing account with an online bookshop
I log into the website
I search for a specific book
I will be able to select the book from the search results
The book description will be loaded with price and an option to order
I have an existing account with an online bookshop
I log into the website

elements.name: Add a book to the basket

steps.name: I search and load a specific book
I click on the Add tp basket option
The book will be added to the basket
I have an existing account with an online bookshop
I log into the website
I add a book to the basket
I load the added products
I will be able to increase the quantity
I will be able to remove the products from the basket

name: Online Bookshop
description: I want to create test scenarios about online bookshop operations

steps.name: I run a SOAP request using code 43080083

name: Bank branches search based on a BLZ codes

steps.name: I want to create new user profile
I fill out the form and click on the Create Account button
My account is created and I'm able to log into WordPress with that account
I want to validate error message from WordPress
I enter invalid credentials and click on Login
I won't be logged in

name: User Registration
description: I want to register new user in WordPress.

elements.name: Create an entry in the DB

steps.name: I want to create new employee entry in the DB
I send my json to the POST endpoint
I will see response 200
The response body will contain new employee ID
An employee entry exists in the DB
I perform GET API call using the employee ID
The API call will return the employee name
An employee entry exists in the DB
I perform DELETE API call using the employee ID
the user will no longer exist

name: Test REST API calls
description: I want to execute API calls to create and retrieve information
